recipeList.directions: 3-Directions: Combine Chicken, Rice, Coconut milk, and Egg in a bowl and mix thoroughly. Heat Olive Oil in a pan, pour the mixture into the pan and cook until the crepes are golden brown.
recipeList.ingredients: 2-Ingredients: Cooked Rice, Chicken, Coconut Milk, Egg, Olive Oil

recipeList.directions: Directions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add chicken breasts and season with garlic powder and salt. Cook chicken until golden brown on both sides and fully cooked. Serve over cooked white rice.
recipeList.ingredients: Ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, 1 cup of cooked white rice, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 teaspoon of garlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon of salt.

recipeList.recipeName: 1 Ingredients: 2 cups cooked rice, 1 lb chicken breast.
recipeList.ingredients: 2 Directions: Preheat oven to 425F. Bake chicken in a baking dish until cooked through, about 25 minutes. Combo the cooked chicken with the cooked rice.
